item.title: Exporting Project on Google Drive using Golang Quickstart
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for exporting a project on Google Drive to local PC using Golang Quickstart. A file with refresh token is saved to the same directory with this script as go-quickstart.json. Before you run this script, please enable Drive API on your Google API console. Points for exporting project In order to export project, both drive.DriveScriptsScope and drive.DriveScope have to be included in the scope. The mimeType for exporting has to be “application/vnd.
